heroTitle: Your boutique hotel in Munich – Haidhausen
heroSub: 51 individual rooms. Regional breakfast. Personal service 24/7.
trustBullets: Travellers' Choice – Best of the Best
locationCopy: In the heart of Haidhausen by Munich East station. Marienplatz in <10 minutes.
breakfastCopy: Fresh regional produce daily 6:30–10:30. Honor Bar in the evening.
sustainabilityCopy: Rooftop solar, durable premium furnishings, local sourcing.
